name: Lottfl 3
description:
This is a racing/driving game i am working on. It is based of from Lottfl, a game i also made. Read the Gameplay info!

In this version i have improved the driving and the car mechanics and tried to make the game more appealing. There is currently only one level and no AI's to race against, but some might me added in the future.

Gameplay info:

Control the car with the arrow keys or W,S,A,D keys, or a controller. Ctrl+r to reset.

The red flag must be hit in order to activate the finish line
